TopicTitle: Extremely bouncy landing struts make it almost impossible to land.

Articles.Content:
The landing struts in ksp console edition are extremely bouncy. Even at landing speeds <5 m/s it touches down smoothly and then starts to bounce repeatedly. I have tried all possible combinations of spring strength and damper strength but everytime it starts bouncing after touchdown. Is there any solution to this? 

 

Edited June 29 by power15514
